survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Autonomous Grocery Shopping Carts Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction and experience with autonomous grocery shopping carts in retail environments.

questions.question_text: How often do you use autonomous grocery shopping carts?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point frequency scale to capture usage patterns clearly.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How often do you use autonomous grocery shopping carts?

questions.question_text: Which features of autonomous grocery shopping carts do you find most useful? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who answered 'Occasionally', 'Frequently', or 'Very frequently' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to identify key features driving satisfaction.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox for multi-choice selection.
